She convinced us all to send postcards to each other - we randomly drew names, wrote the cards and they should come any day... I just need to make it out to check my mail!

Iulia and Kristi ventured down into the south this past weekend and stayed with me for a few days. We had a tentative plan - and hit most everything on the list - and always with a bit more adventure than you'd expect. We headed out to the Biltmore House on Friday ( urlLink www.biltmore.com ) and then made it back in time for a great indian dinner ala Vinay... There was chicken curry, paratha, paneer with spinach and a daal...I wish Kristi and Iulia came for dinner more often - Vinay is a great cook! Sat we went rafting - overall it was fun. The Pigeon River is supposed to be a mild river with mostly 3's and a few 4's. Our theory of hot rafting guides and hooking up Iulia didn't quite pan out... Our guide, Alison, was a little late on a call (or something) and led us into a rock. The rock sent half our boat - Vinay, a poor woman, and Kristi - all overboard in the middle of a rapid. It was terrifying! Exciting after they make it back into the boat - but very scary watching them float towards rocks and not being able to pull them back in. But everyone did make it into the boat and one day the rafting folks will send us a picture and then we can pass it on... It made it easy to understand the instinct to jump in and pull people out - at the same time it was very clearly a really bad idea... Sunday we road on the Creeper Trail. There is a great program called Rails to Trails - check out urlLink www.railstotrails.org . They create bike trails out of old railroad paths - so the grade is limited to 5% or less. This trail has a shuttle to the top and is 17 miles down! Mostly without pedaling. The next thing to try is their night rides. Hopefully we won't encounter any animals. This time there were 2 deer. Beautiful deer... And tomorrow I get back to the tn regular life... Or atleast to work... The calculations are coming, the deadline is fast approaching, but supposedly there is help in sight. I was working last Thursday - but specifically on what, I've completely forgotten. Definitely a good weekend!
